full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 69 of 236 973 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross 1 Q. I think you testified that there were many properties that Mr. Epstein owned, right? 2 A. Yes. 3 Q. And you had been to those properties, correct? 4 A. Briefly, yes. 5 Q. And all of those properties required substantial daily maintenance and care, correct? 6 A. I imagine so. 7 Q. Okay, just like the Palm Beach property required, correct? 8 A. Of course. 9 Q. Okay. 10 So that was why there was a plan to do regular scheduled checklists for maintenance and things, correct? 11 A. I guess so. 12 Q. Mr. Epstein was your boss, correct? 13 A. That's correct. 14 Q. When Mr. Epstein was in Palm Beach, you would go to Mr. Epstein for direction, correct? 15 A. No. I will go directly to Ms. Maxwell. She was my immediate superior. I will go to her first. 16 Q. Do you recall that -- let's talk about Mr. Epstein for a little bit. 17 Mr. Epstein wanted his properties to be run like five-star hotels, correct? 18 A. That's correct. 19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018170
